scripts.test: npm run test -w @circuitraces/engine && npm run test -w @circuitraces/generator
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit -p packages/engine && tsc --noEmit -p packages/generator && tsc --noEmit -p apps/web
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm test && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build -w @circuitraces/engine && npm run build -w @circuitraces/web
